notes/2025/AI_AUTOMATION.title: AI_AUTOMATION
notes/2025/AI_AUTOMATION.content:
LEARN AI AUTOMATION WITH PLAYWRIGHT
INSTALLNATION:

Open vs code
npm init playwright@latest
Choose between TypeScript or JavaScript (default is TypeScript)
Name of your Tests folder (default is tests or e2e if you already have a tests folder in your project)
Add a GitHub Actions workflow to easily run tests on CI
Install Playwright browsers (default is true)
To run the Playwright npx playwright test(this will run all test)
To run specfic test npx playwright test —spec path
To show report npx playwright show-report
To run playwright using ui mode npx playwright test —ui
To run run code with specific browser npx playwright test —project=chromium
To run test in dubug mode npx playwright test —debug
To run test in auto generate mode npx playwright codegen
To update latest version of playwright npm install -D @playwright/test@latest and install latest binaries of browsers
npx playwright install —with-deps

System requirements​

Latest version of Node.js 18, 20 or 22.
Windows 10+, Windows Server 2016+ or Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL).
macOS 14 Ventura, or later.
Debian 12, Ubuntu 22.04, Ubuntu 24.04, on x86-64 and arm64 architecture.

Browse Use Setup
github.com/browser-use/browser-use#
1.To use browse Use should have python above version 3.11
2.While install if seen any issue like unable each modules of each version then use below commad
If you are using a virtual environment or have specific Python versions, you might need to use python -m pip install --upgrade pip to ensure you’re upgrading the correct pip.
python3.11 -m pip install —upgrade pip
3. To install browse use with correct version python3.11 -m pip install browser-use

notes/2025/MCP-SERCER.title: MCP SERCER
notes/2025/MCP-SERCER.content:
MCP Server
The full form of MCP server, in the context of AI and large language models, is Model Context Protocol server. It acts as a standardized way for AI models to connect with external tools, systems, and data sources.
INSTALLNATIOM
